ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 — Twenty-Second Qualifying Period)
PrecisRegulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 — TWENTY-SECOND QUALIFYING PERIOD) in order to extend and enhance from October 24, 2021 until November 20, 2021 (1) the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy and the Canada Emergency Rent Subsidy through two new programs: a) the Tourism and Hospitality Recovery Program; and b) the Hardest-Hit Business Recovery Program; (2) the Lockdown Support for tourism, hospitality and other hard-hit businesses; and (3) the Canada Recovery Hiring Program.
